div.ab: To know what a woman carries, male or female: Drip milk from her in a vessel full of water that is (quality?), and [if] the milk falls under, so is it a male, and [if] it swims above, so is it a female, and it is certain.

A fine powder to make brown white as snow: Take silver egg, two ounces, and sublimated(?) silver, eight or nine ounces and beat(?) fully together and let it (sit overnight?) and beat(?) it fully, and then take it and (put?) in the sun that is fully hot and mix it all the next day with water from (parsley?) or another good water, it is certain.
For the evil eye: Take an oil jug(?) and let the child(?) blow in it three times, and spit out three times. So will it heal, certainly.
